证据片段: Specimens from pressure tube and similar material were machined in the form of "gutters" of 60 deg included angle, 76.2 mm (3 in.) long and 0.762 mm (30 mil) thick

文献ID: STP633-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_3rd Volume_021_chunk3
证据片段: The accepted out-of-pile oxidation curve for Zircaloy-2 exposed at 280°C in pressurized water shows a linear post-transition rate of the order of 0.01 mg/dm²/d (mdd).

文献ID: STP633-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_3rd Volume_021_chunk3
证据片段: Some confirmation of this post-transition rate was obtained for specimens of main route Zircaloy-2 pressure tube and fuel cladding which were preoxidized at 330°C prior to exposure in the SGHWR steam drum. These settled down to give a mean extrapolated linear rate 0.0067 mdd in reasonable agreement with the accepted value.

文献ID: STP633-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_3rd Volume_021_chunk3
证据片段: The slope of the line is 8.89 mg/dm² per 10²⁰ neutrons (n)/cm²

文献ID: STP633-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_3rd Volume_021_chunk3
证据片段: for a nominal peak flux at the pressure tube of 3×10¹³ n/cm²/s an exposure of one day gives 0.0259×10²⁰ n/cm² so that the expected corrosion rate at this flux would be 0.23 mg/dm²/d

文献ID: STP633-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_3rd Volume_021_chunk3
证据片段: In the particular case of the fuel cladding preoxidized at 400°C, the slope of 13.65 mg/dm² per 10²⁰ n/cm² would indicate a corrosion rate at 3×10¹³ n/cm²/s flux of 0.35 mg/dm²/d
